scripts.start: NOTEBOOK_JWT_IMPERSONATE_KEY=asdf1234lkjh NOTEBOOK_CORS_BYPASS_KEY=7f9a446d5b9e68aeb95fd8d20905e2971145de750f46060b1b08f67103d8c1120555af46f13dfac59abbedab06ededf325cc4c9f5b4c1b1e878b1f5be9e8e929 concurrently -n server-build,server,client -c blueBright,greenBright "npm run -w server build:watch" "npm run -w server start:serve" "npm run -w client start:dev"
scripts.start:server: NOTEBOOK_JWT_IMPERSONATE_KEY=asdf1234lkjh NOTEBOOK_CORS_BYPASS_KEY=7f9a446d5b9e68aeb95fd8d20905e2971145de750f46060b1b08f67103d8c1120555af46f13dfac59abbedab06ededf325cc4c9f5b4c1b1e878b1f5be9e8e929 concurrently -n server-build,server,client -c blueBright,greenBright "npm run -w server build:watch" "npm run -w server start:serve"
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run build -w server && npm run schema:drop && npm run schema:sync && npm run seed:run
